title: House Democrats to subpoena Sondland after deposition blocked
text: The House Democrats have 6 subpoenas out for witnesses and documents regarding the impeachment inquiry, but the Trump administration is not cooperating. That might begin to have an impact, as a new poll shows that most Americans now back an impeachment inquiry. NBC News National Political Reporter Josh Lederman, New York Times Chief White House Correspondent Peter Baker, Politico Senior Writer Jake Sherman, US Attorney Joyce Vance, and MSNBC National Political Correspondent Steve Kornacki join Katy Tur to discuss.
